title: The New England Patriots beat the Buffalo Bills with one arm tied behind their back (Brady Quinn Football Show 12/08/21)
description:
What's in a name, or more importantly, what's in an accent? Both Will Brinson and Brady discuss Brian Kelly's new accent in Baton Rouge before diving into the New England Patriots needing only three passing attempts to beat the Buffalo Bills on Monday night. The Patriots are giving off 2001 vibes to Will and they discuss the top three teams in the AFC.

(00:45) What's in an accent
(10:19) Bills/Patriots Takeaways
(16:46) Are there similarities between this current Patriots team and the 2001 Patriots team?
(20:10) More Bills/Patriots Takeaways
(27:25) Are the Patriots the best team in the AFC?
(33:09) When reporters overstep their boundaries

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
